comment: /**  * Obtain the canonical instance of this ProfileValueSource.  */
code: /**  * Obtain the canonical instance of this ProfileValueSource.  */ public static final SystemProfileValueSource getInstance() {     return INSTANCE. }

comment: /** * Get the profile value indicated by the specified key from the * system properties. * @see System#getProperty(String) */
code: /** * Get the profile value indicated by the specified key from the * system properties. * @see System#getProperty(String) */ @Override public String get(String key) { Assert.hasText(key, "'key' must not be empty"). return System.getProperty(key). }
